title: BUbreakingHeadlines
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 2 dead and 58 sick from growing Legionnaires' disease cluster in New York City
items.description: Two people have died and at least 58 people have been diagnosed with Legionnaires’ disease in a cluster that broke out in New York City last week.

items.title: 3 linked to suspect arrested in Tenn. killings of abandoned infant's relatives
items.description: Tennessee investigators allege Dearrah Sanders, Tanaka Brown and Giovonte Thomas "assisted" Austin Robert Drummond, who is wanted in the murders.

items.description: ABC News' Ian Pannell spoke to the brother of Evyatar David, an Israeli hostage seen in footage released by Hamas over the weekend.

items.title: WATCH:  Pilot rescued after making an emergency landing in the ocean in Oak Island, N.C.
items.description: A pilot was rescued after his small plane crashed in the water off the coast of Oak Island, North Carolina on Saturday.
